attributes.action: NO mandatory covid vaccine for people with proven covid-19 antibodies
attributes.additional_details: I feel it is against human rights to have mandatory vaccinations as a condition of employment if the immune system of someone has natural antibodies from previously having covid-19 and therefore does not require a vaccination. I myself had covid-19 13 months ago and an antibody blood test is showing I still have antibodies.
attributes.background: To NOT make covid-19 vaccinations mandatory as a condition of any deployment in any work sector if, after a minimum 6 months of a person having covid-19 a proven, positive antibodies blood sample test is completed

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602031
